title: The Rosemary Beach Collection: Rush and Blaire
description: The Rosemary Beach Collection brings together Fallen Too Far, Never Too Far, and Forever Too Far, three sensational new adult novels by #1 New York Times bestselling author Abbi Glines.Fallen Too Far. A story of summer love in the coastal resort town of Rosemary Beach, tough Alabama farm girl Blaire Wynn can’t resist gorgeous but spoiled stepbrother Rush Finlay, but she doesn’t know he has a secret that could destroy her entire world.Never Too Far. Continuing the gripping romance of Fallen Too Far, Blaire is crushed by Rush’s shattering revelation and moves back to Alabama, but unexpected news complicates her plans to stay away from the bad boy.Forever Too Far. The conclusion to the intensely passionate story of Rush and Blaire, the two embrace a future together after Blaire forgives Rush for the past, but Rush’s family stands in the way between them.
author: Abbi Glines
